Reviews.Title: at least decent
Reviews.Author: unsatisfied
Reviews.Content: I got this item in quite quickly although it was not what I had expected at all. At first glance the phone seem wonderful until I noticed adhesive glue sticki sticking out of the screen where it had been replaced. Then at the bottom the frame was bend showing the charging connection through the bend and the screen... I immediately messaged them about this... as I see up the phone and turned it on the keyboard went completely crazy. There's a picture in the back ground of my screen that shows off a yellow tint and I can read it as it says in big letters media hub hd and the bottom says gaming in really big letters. Only part of the screentthat's normal is a strip down the right side :( very frustrating at this point I go online using the phone to email them again and it keeps sending me to time format ugh.. then goes back to home screen no matter what I push.. if that isn't bad then it keeps showing bright colors as I glitches as if it is completely water damaged... I'm truly sad as I had my hopes up so high as to replace this phone I love this brand so dearly. And I'm not sure what this means but the phone keeps telling me that a format has been downloaded and updated but there's an error in the format process.. what is that!? Still waiting to hear back from them and hoping I can get a good phone or a refund so that I can get a decent one. :( just hoped they would have tested the product out before sending it off.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY SAMSUNG GALAXY NOTE i717!
Reviews.Author: Khetasi
Reviews.Content: My Samsung Galaxy Note arrived on time as promised. It was unlocked and exactly as described. I love my Galaxy Note. It is the second I have bought.

Reviews.Title: love my phone
Reviews.Author: Anais
Reviews.Content: Its a used phone in perfect conditions works like it was new the best investment that I have made on a phone

Reviews.Title: love this phone!
Reviews.Author: Krista Friend
Reviews.Content: Love love love this phone! I have had it for a little over a month and have not had one issue with it. It was shipped in a timely manner and I received it quickly. It was exactly as described and has worked great since day one!

Reviews.Title: Good phone, until you root it
Reviews.Author: Crump212
Reviews.Content: This was a great phone when I first got it. Great speed and versatility. Played any and all games, apps, etc. I never had any problems with thus phone whatsoever.I decided one day I wanted more control over the phone, so I rooted it. One thing led to another, now this phone has more glitches than the first android phones.This is aa awesome phone. My only suggestion is that if you are thinking about getting this phone and rooting it, don't. If you are not looking for that, or don't even know what "root" is and are looking for a really good phone, this one will be amazing.

Reviews.Title: Neat phone
Reviews.Author: Quarterpounder
Reviews.Content: This is just what the wife was looking for.  Its like a tablet and a smart phone all in one.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Micheal Newberry
Reviews.Content: after using this phone for awhile it is amazing i love the size , I thought it would be a little big but it fits really nice in my hands , nice and fast just wish they would give the jelly bean update , amazing phone i love it

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: harry e mason
Reviews.Content: best xmas gift ever says my daughter.not one complaint these guys were the best to work with even when i messed up.thanks

ProductInfo.Features:
The Samsung Galaxy Note SGH-I717 is a unique device bridging the gap between phones and tablets
it features a extra-large 5.3-inch Super AMOLED HD display, and includes a stylus pen and handwriting recognition
It also comes with multiple exclusive apps for taking notes, sketching, and more
This device is also equipped with 4G LTE data, 8-megapixel camera with a 2-megapixel front camera, and 1.5 GHz dual-core processor
Connect with Wi-Fi, DLNA WiFi streaming, and quadband GSM along with WCDMA modes for international use
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Note 16GB SGH-i717 4G LTE Black - AT&T
